name: Dare Tower
description:
A party game that compliments a popular tumbling tower game! Pull a physical block and then click the Game prompt to receive your Dare! When the Tower falls, Click the "Tower Fall" button and enter the Offending players name to properly punish them! Play if you DARE!

The game features a fully editable Dare support to personalize to your party, as well as, a hilarious use of Microsoft's built in Text-To-Speech to deliver them.

The Dares are editable by the player(s) through editing the "DareList.txt" Contained in the "Dare Tower_Data/StreamingAssets" Folder.

REQUIREMENTS:

  • Physical Block Tower Game
  • 2+ Players
  • Windows x64 OS - for TTS to work properly
